name: Rapprechaun
description:
Play as Raprechaun (feat MC. Leprechaun) and collect alt treasures!

- WASD to control your character
- Collect all treasures

- Enemies make turn after you
- Pick gold to open the stairs
- Listen and read unique Rapprechaun rap rhymes!
- Every turn you lose 1 coin
- Get highscore at you leprechaun run!

Control:
WASD to move

M - Mute sounds
